ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Status) = 'Escalated', $Profile.Name != 'Salesforce API Only System Integrations', !$Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration, ISBLANK(scc_Billing_Number__c), ISBLANK(SCC_Nomor_Briva_Tagihan__c), SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8433' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Nomor Billing / Nomor BRIVA wajib diisi salah satu
